Name: Light Crystal Shard Lv.2
Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
Description$english: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
Description2$english: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.
